titleStmt.title: Dauids teacher, or The true teacher of the right-vvay to heauen Discouering erroneous teachers and seditious sectuaries. Preached at Paules-Crosse the 3. of September. 1609. By Ro: Iohnson, M. of Arts, chaplaine to the Right Reuerend Father in God, the L. Bishop of Lincolne.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Robert, chaplain to the Bishop of Lincoln.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Haueland, for Mathew Law, and are to be solde at his shop in Pauls-Church-yard, neere S. Austins-gate, at the signe of the Fox,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls-Church-yard, neere S. Austins-gate, at the signe of the Fox
